did.abstract: Pinky Herman was a television editor and columnist whose regularly featured articles appeared in such entertainment trade papers as Television Today, Motion Picture Daily, and Radio/TV Daily. The collection consists of his newspaper columns about entertainment talent and executives.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Pinky Herman was a television editor and columnist for Radio Daily (1940s), Motion Picture Daily, and Television Today (1950s-60s). His regularly featured columns chronicled the comings, goings, signings, and project initiations of entertainment talent and executives. Herman died in the early 1990s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of columns written by television editor Pinky Herman. Includes columns published in the entertainment trade papers Television Today, Motion Picture Daily, and Radio/TV Daily. The columns cover projects regarding industry professionals (1943-50, 1954-71). There is no inventory list for this collection.
